doc:
Tiny Sandford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tiny_Sandford 0 Stanley J. "Tiny" Sandford (February 26, 1894 – October 29, 1961) was a tall, burly actor who is best remembered for his roles in Laurel and Hardy and Charlie Chaplin films. He was usually cast as a comic heavy, and often played policemen, doormen, prizefighters, or bullies. Stanley_J._"_Tiny_"_Sandford ( February_26_,_1894 – October_29_,_1961 ) was a_tall_,_burly_actor who is_best_remembered for his_roles in Laurel_and_Hardy and Charlie_Chaplin_films . He was_usually_cast as a_comic_heavy , and often_played policemen , doormen , prizefighters , or bullies .
